DOC.brief_summary: In the present study, serum pentraxin 3 level and its relationship with insulin resistance were determined in patients with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS. It was found that PTX3 level is increased in patients with PCOS and it is positively correlated with HOMA-IR.
DOC.brief_title: High Plasma Level of Long Pentraxin 3 is Associated With Insulin Resistance in Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
DOC.criteria: Absence of significant abnormalities on physical examination except hirsutism No lipid lowering, hypoglycemic, antihypertensive or hormone replacement therapy Normal thyroid function and prolactin level Absence of history or evidence of metabolic, cardiovascular, respiratory or hepatic disease Pregnant Possible ovarian tumors, Congenital adrenal hyperplasia or BMI greater than 35 kg/m2
